name: Soul Searching (itch) (Shiggy95)
description:
My first ever game!

A short story about an evil boss named "Big Boss Man" who steals "Player"'s soul.

Fight through Spanksy Castle in order to retrieve your fragmented soul and defeat Big Boss Man's minions!

Retrieving your soul is only one part of the journey... Once you are whole  again, you  must defeat all of the remaining minions to return back from where you started!

Good luck brave traveller!
